https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/k5MtwwHupziz6RLVtsvf6GAOtfX.jpg Is it possible to film miracles? The camera shows pilgrims, who watch a window of a school in a small town in the East of Poland, where several people already believed to have seen the Virgin Mary. A Miracle
